name: Better Fandom
description:
Out of pure spite and hatred for the Fandom website design, I wrote a little bit of CSS that massively improves Fandom. 

Removed:
- Ads
- Unexpected popups
- Articles
- Unnecessarily bright color schemes 
- Pop-up video player

Added:
- Darker color scheme in place of the bright eye-sore
- Improved readability, flexibility, and flow
